headline: Evaluating MarketAxess (MKTX) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: MarketAxess Holdings (MKTX) has remained on investors’ radar this month, as its stock performance continues to reflect trends seen across the wider financial technology sector. Over the past month, shares have slipped around 4%. See our latest analysis for MarketAxess Holdings. After a rocky start to 2024, MarketAxess Holdings' share price has declined nearly 24% since January and sits well below last year's level. Its 1-year total shareholder return is down almost 40%. Short-term momentum...
